title: Number of visitors to the Grand Canyon National Park in the U.S. 2008 to 2019
summary: Grand Canyon National Park U.S. Park in the Park attracted a total of approximately 5.97 millions visitors in 2019 , down from its visitation peak of 6.38 millions in 2018 .
A Grand Canyon National Park U.S. uniting nations Grand Canyon National Park U.S. Park 's name derived from the many glaciers that shaped its topography for over 5.52 millions years .

Located in Montana on the Canada-U.S. border , Grand Canyon National Park U.S. Park is the second half of the Glacier-Waterton International Peace Grand Canyon National Park U.S. , the first half being Waterton Lakes Grand Canyon National Park U.S. in Canada .
